name: Santa's Last Stand
description:
Santa's Last Stand is a small shooter made for 7 Day FPS gamejam, where you try to survive the longest you can against the neverending waves of zombified worker elfs.

There is no story in the game yet, but the premise of the it is simple: Certain Christmas Cretin gifted a necronomicon-like book to Santa and everything went bad.

The 7DFPS edition is a bit janky due to some events, that hindered game development. Sorry in advance :) 
Merry Christmas!

Controls

WASD - movement

Mouse to look

Space -  jump

Shift - run

R - reload

LMB - shoot
